alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 3:26PM MST until August 26 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall will continue within normally dry washes between Interstate 40 and Wikieup. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 515 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 324 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has ended. However, minor flooding is will continue in the advisory area until 515 pm MST. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Pearson Falls Wash, Natural Corrals Wash, Antelope Wash, McGarrys Wash, West Fork Sycamore Creek, Fork Rock Creek, Big Sandy River, Ash Creek, Cedar Wash, Jackman Wash, Gonzales Wash, Moss Wash, Blue Tank Wash, Knight Creek, Cane Springs Wash, Kabba Wash, Bitter Creek, McGee Wash, Lookout Wash, Trout Creek, Timber Wash, East Ash Creek, Tule Wash, Hair Clipper Wash, Cottonwood Creek, Left Hand Moss Wash, Bottleneck Wash, Deluge Wash, Francis Creek, Wheeler Wash, Peacock Wash, Wagon Wheel Wash, Willow Creek, Crow Canyon, Pilgrim Wash and Bull Canyon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Blake Ranch Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
